summary:

Pixie can be found in the Before the stable in Whiterun

[b][b][b][color=#f1c232][size=5][About this mod]
[/size][/color][/b][/b][/b]□Pixie is a standalone follower +Second Follower Elfin
□They're at a Warmaiden.
□She is Essential
□She is not strong
□Fighting style/Little of avoidance capability+Archery+Dual wield+Little recovery
